channel.title: New robes i just finished
channel.description:
frontal view: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/therobesfrontalview_zpsfee5e72b.jpg[/img]
Right view: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/robesrightview_zpscea43463.jpg[/img]
top back view: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/robesbackview_zps62a80166.jpg[/img]
wireframe: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/wireframe_zps2d2dcb6c.jpg[/img]
this is a new pair of robes im gunna be adding into my project im scrapping all rs models and making my own and with this im gunna delete objects like rune ore and stuff like that and make my own. i know its gunna take a while but i think i can do it.

item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“holylouis, post:3, topic:463442”]hadlich we have bout same idea but… u got a head start also im gonna redo the entire game…npcs and all and i have yet to figure out how to change gobral objects and wat not but im in the process of learning and i havent even started on my first model -.- but very nice

i chopped up that whole msg btw[/quote]

you know how to animate custom npc’s? thats my only problem is yea i can make the npc’s and all but i have no idea how to animate them considering i cant use rsposer to do so atleast i dont think i can. well if you do know how could you show me would appreciate the help.

Read full topic

item.title: New robes i just finished
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

The model looks good but the coloring is kinda weird. Are you trying to add shading? In meta double click the object and change the apply smoothing option from 59.5 to 120. That what rs render models at ans it doesn’t look so blocky.

Read full topic
